prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon that looks like a dinosaur with gray armor and a big mouth.
I want to see a Pokemon that resembles a prehistoric creature with metallic features and vibrant colors.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that combines elements of a turtle and a dinosaur with spikes.
Make a Pokemon design with a tough exterior and a cheerful personality, featuring shades of gray and blue.
Imagine a steel-type Pokemon that is robust and has a playful demeanor, suitable for battles.
Design a Pokemon with a unique combination of rock and steel elements, showcasing a strong presence.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, with a body shape resembling that of a quadruped.
